name: CompletePayment
description:
Complete an approved payment using Squareup.

Use this tool to complete or capture a payment with an 'APPROVED' status, finalizing the transaction.

parameters.name: payment_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID identifying the payment to be completed. This is required for completing a payment with an 'APPROVED' status.

value_schema.description: The unique ID identifying the payment to be completed.

parameters.name: current_payment_version_token
parameters.description: The token identifying the current Payment version for optimistic concurrency. It ensures the Payment version matches the caller's expectations to prevent mismatches.

value_schema.description:
Used for optimistic concurrency. This opaque token identifies the current `Payment`
version that the caller expects. If the server has a different version of the Payment,
the update fails and a response with a VERSION_MISMATCH error is returned.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: payment_id
parameters.description: The unique ID identifying the payment to be completed.

value_schema.description: The unique ID identifying the payment to be completed.

parameters.name: version_token
parameters.description:
Used for optimistic concurrency. This opaque token identifies the current `Payment`
version that the caller expects. If the server has a different version of the Payment,
the update fails and a response with a VERSION_MISMATCH error is returned.

value_schema.description:
Used for optimistic concurrency. This opaque token identifies the current `Payment`
version that the caller expects. If the server has a different version of the Payment,
the update fails and a response with a VERSION_MISMATCH error is returned.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
